parameters.name: DistinctKey
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the tag is DistinctKey.

Valid values: **true and false**.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the SLB instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Minimum value: 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 50. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance is deployed.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that you want to query.
